translations: 赠予，授予（财产、权力或荣誉）；<古>存放，贮藏；使用

sentences.sentence: Conversely, the stemma can also bestow a semblance of separation on manuscripts written within a few months of one another or even in the same room.
sentences.translation: 相反地，族谱也可以给几个月之内写的手稿一种分离的假象，甚至是在同一个房间里写的。

sentences.sentence: And you can bestow love upon things.
You also bestow love upon her or him.
